content: as the handles are a bit wider row 1 sl 1pwise wyif k1 x 12 turn 24 sts row 2 p2tog sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 23 sts row 3 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 sl 1 pwise wyib k2tog 22 sts row 4 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 row 5 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 11 row 6 p2tog sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 21 sts row 7 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 9 sl 1 pwise wyif k2tog 20 sts row 8 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 the handles are the same length on both sizes of the bag so now work 30 row in this two row pattern row 1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 row 2 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 and now the increasing row for the other end of the handle row 1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 9 sl 1 pwise wyif kf&b 21 sts row 2 p1 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 row 3 sl 1 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 sl 1 pwise wyif row 4 puff&b sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 22 sts row 5 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 11 row 6 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 10 row 7 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 sl 1 pwise wyif kf&b 23 sts row 8 p1 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 cast off in pattern following row 5 above and then ending with a k1 the long handle re-join yarn to the remaining stitches and cast off 13 stitches in pattern starting with a sl 1 pwise wyif remember that you already have one stitch on your needle at the start of row 1 row 1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x11 23 sts row 2 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 sl 1 pwise wyib row 3 ssk k1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 22 sts row 4 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 row 5 ssk sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 21 sts row 6 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 sl 1 pwise wyib row 7 ssk k1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 9 20 sts row 8 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 work 66 row straight without shaping following this two row pattern row 1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 row 2 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 and now the increasing … row 1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 row 2 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 9 sl 1 pwise wyib puff&b 21 sts row 3 k1 sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 row 4 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 10 sl 1 pwise wyib row 5 kf&b sl 1 pwise wyif k1 x 10 22 sts row 6 sl 1 pwise wyib p1 x 11 row 7
